_header: When Maximian for all his tyranny
Subjects: Barbara, saint, life of; saints’ lives
_description: Life of St. Barbara, in one MS of the South English Legendary

BodRawPoe225.First Lines:
Whan Maximian for alle his tyrandyseHadde gouernaunce of þe
                    emperyalte…
BodRawPoe225.Last Lines:
…& of owr enymyes to sen dyscomfyteAnd euer in grace &
                    mercy god vs alle blesse
